issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h5.Description
Having analytics set to true in the tiapp.xml causes no error, and analytical data is sent and received properly.
However, setting it to false crashes the application whenever an event is sent (e.g, featureEvent)

h5.Steps To Reproduce
1. Download the attached project
2. Set analytics to false in the tiapp.xml
3. Run the project on blackberry device
4. Select featureEvent

h5.Expected Result
Nothing should happen, no analytics should be sent and the app should continue running.

h5.Actual Result
Application crashes and closes
fields.summary: BlackBerry: Setting analytics to false in the tiapp.xml causes the application to crash and force close
fields.environment:
Mac OSX 10.9.2
Appcelerator Studio, build: 3.2.3.201403271839
Titanium SDK, build: 3.2.3.v20140403105720
CLI: 3.2.3-alpha2
BlackBerry Z10: 10.2.1.2234

comments.body: Placing these items on hold for the moment based on community interest.
Closing ticket as BlackBerry is no longer supported by us.
